algorithm.name: TRTIS
algorithm.description: Returns a model-specific inference result from an input image.

properties.name: TRTIS_SERVER
properties.description: The DNS name or IP address and GRPC port of an NVIDIA TensorRT Inference Server (TRTIS) which is setup to server the requested model' inferences. If the value is set to the empty string "", the component will instead use the environment variable for `TRTIS_SERVER`, if it is available.

properties.name: MODEL_NAME
properties.description: The model on the inference server to be used for inferencing. 'ip_irv2_coco' is provided by default. NOTE: Currently, only 'ip_irv2_coco' is supported.

properties.name: MODEL_VERSION
properties.description: The version number of the inference server model. '-1' means the latest version available on the server.

properties.name: MAX_INFER_CONCURRENCY
properties.description: Maximum number of inference requests that will be sent to the server concurrently for video inferencing. This allows time overlapping of inferencing on the server and reading/processing video frames on the client.

properties.name: USER_FEATURE_ENABLE
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Whether or not to generate similarity feature detections for user-specified bounding box. All of these features have a confidence of -1.

properties.name: USER_FEATURE_X_LEFT_UPPER
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Upper left hand user bounding box pixel x-coordinate.

properties.name: USER_FEATURE_Y_LEFT_UPPER
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Upper left hand user bounding box pixel y-coordinate.

properties.name: USER_FEATURE_WIDTH
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Width of user bounding box in pixels, defaults to image/frame width when value <= 0.

properties.name: USER_FEATURE_HEIGHT
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Height of user bounding box in pixels, defaults to image/frame height when value <= 0.

properties.name: FRAME_FEATURE_ENABLE
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Whether or not to generate a similarity feature for the entire image/each frame.  This feature is a size weighted average of all other features in the image/frame. All of these features have a confidence of -1.

properties.name: CLASS_FEATURE_ENABLE
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Whether or not to generate similarity features for any detected COCO-class objects.

properties.name: EXTRA_FEATURE_ENABLE
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Whether or not to generate similarity features for any candidate object regions that could not be classified as COCO objects.

properties.name: CLIENT_PRESCALING_ENABLE
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Whether to scale images/frames on the client or inference server to approximately [1024 x 600] as required by this model.

properties.name: RECOGNITION_ENROLL_ENABLE
properties.description: NOTE: Not implemented yet. 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Whether to send generated similarity features to recognition frame work for enrollment in a gallery.

properties.name: CLASS_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Specifies threshold for object region detections that can be classified as COCO objects.

properties.name: EXTRA_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Threshold for object region detections that could not be classified as COCO objects.  Note, the confidence scores of these extra detections is generally close to 0.

properties.name: TRACK_MAX_FEATURE_GAP
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Maximum gap in similarity feature space (i.e. cos-distance) for objects to be considered to be in the same track.

properties.name: TRACK_MAX_FRAME_GAP
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Maximum gap in frames (i.e. time) for objects to be considered to be in the same track.

properties.name: TRACK_MAX_SPACE_GAP
properties.description: 'ip_irv2_coco' model specific: Maximum gap in diagonal-normalized pixel space for objects to be considered to be in the same track. Normalization is performed via the image/frame diagonal (sqrt[width*width + height*height])

actions.name: TRTIS IP_IRV2_COCO DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Performs TRTIS detection using the 'ip_irv2_coco' model.

tasks.name: TRTIS IP_IRV2_COCO DETECTION TASK
tasks.description: Performs TRTIS detection using the 'ip_irv2_coco' model.

pipelines.name: TRTIS IP_IRV2_COCO DETECTION PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs TRTIS detection using the 'ip_irv2_coco' model.

pipelines.name: TRTIS IP_IRV2_COCO DETECTION (WITH MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs TRTIS detection using the 'ip_irv2_coco' model and produces markup.
